name: Palstone Adventure
description:
Palstone Adventure! Go on a grand journey through the isles of power with your very own Palstone companion!

Made in Renpy for PigSquad's 2021 August Summer Slow Jam, themes being cliffhanger and 'This isn't even my final form.' Best played using  executables.

Special thanks to Sodonelite!

On the last day of the jam our drake, Huckleberry, passed away. I'd like to dedicate this game to him. RIP Buddy.

Tarot Cards: https://chee-seekins.itch.io/tarot
Monster Art: https://seraphcircle.itch.io/sc-monster-pack-1
Character Art: Sutemo https://sutemo.itch.io/
Special thanks to Exuin's character creator: https://emily2.itch.io/sutemo
Background: CC0 stuff from the web
Gone Fishin': Memoraphile @ You're Perfect Studio, https://opengameart.org/content/gone-fishin

v0.4 was completed before the jam ended, so I'm keeping it available for jam diehards.
